attributes.action: Make School Weeks Only 4 Days Long
attributes.additional_details: Children can’t learn as well if they have school one day after the other. Let kids be social and let them have some mid week relaxation!
attributes.background: Children Should Get To Choose A Day To Have At Home Each Week

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643506
